ing: 3 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
n: Any Way You Want It Kale Smoothie
des: "My toddler loves this one and he gets a serving of each: milk, fruit, and veggie!"
ins: Blend kale, yogurt, and peanuts together in a blender until smooth. Add milk, banana, strawberries, and maple syrup and blend until desired consistency is reached.
